sense.name: have the same value, be or become equivalent to something else
sense.examples: Two plus two equals four. Sixteen ounces equals one pound. In this game, one silver equals to 100 coppers. The height of the tree equals of the car the length. How many lines does 90K characters equal out to roughly? My interest in arts using collage equaled my interest in theory. It will all equal out in the end. All men are equal before the law.

sense.name: produce or achieve something to a particular standard
sense.examples: And with that jump, she has equaled the world record. She equaled the world record in the mile run. The result equaled my expectations a hundred percent. So, let's find out if he can be equaled to the job of presidency.
